scripts.bootstrap: yarn run install-deps && yarn run start-prod
scripts.build-client: cd client && yarn run build && cd ../
scripts.build-server: cd server && yarn run build && yarn run copy-types-for-client && cd ../
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules
scripts.install-client: cd client && yarn install && cd ../ && yarn run copy-types-from-server
scripts.install-deps: yarn install && yarn run install-client && yarn run install-server
scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd client && yarn run watch-css" "cd client && yarn run start" "cd server && yarn run build && yarn run start-dev"
scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=production yarn run build-client && yarn run start-server-prod
scripts.start-server-prod: cd server && yarn run build && yarn run start-prod
scripts.now-build: yarn install && yarn run install-deps && yarn run build-client && yarn run build-server
scripts.copy-types-from-server: cd server && yarn run copy-types-for-client && cd ../
